channel.title: [317] Insanity-Allstar [317]
channel.description:
[size=12pt]Hey guys, Before you start flaming me about how much you hate All-Star, Just look at what i'm going to code into the server. Now Remember this is a blank all-star, not even 1% Completed.
[u]Key:[/u] Done Started Haven't Started _______________________ Never-Before seen areas 1 Click pickup Adding xp Lamps Adding Lottery Fixing all trade scams Taking out blood runes (Dupe) Fixing X-Log (1 connection per ip fixes that) Adding emote tab teleports Adding real Crafting/Firemaking Adding New commands Adding 1 Connection per ip Adding anti-Syi
I Know i haven't started anything, but everytime i finish anything, i will update it on here. Please guys no negative comments. Thanks![/size]

item.title: [317] Insanity-Allstar [317]
item.dc:creator: @mr_dope mr dope
item.description:
@mr_dope wrote:

As Chassy said I’m always available to help anyone with Allstar related things. Matzie however is hard to contact some times but is still a very good resource if you can get a hold of her. Like Xperia I would not recommend taking blood runes out since it looks nicer just fixing the dupes. Matzie also made a tutorial on how to fix the blood rune lag. However, even with the blood rune lag fixed it is still possible to dupe using certain cheat clients.

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Insanity-Allstar [317]
item.dc:creator: @InsanityAllstar InsanityAllstar
item.description:
@InsanityAllstar wrote:

[quote=“TheCyberMan, post:13, topic:411826”][quote author=InsanityAllstar link=topic=513082.msg3724964#msg3724964 date=1314207474]

[quote author=TheCyberMan link=topic=513082.msg3724755#msg3724755 date=1314192726]
Well I wish you luck! I remember working with my Allstar base
[/quote]btw that message you sent me about itss not even out yet lol, i found it and its not by you… its by bill

look at it

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

nice try trying to get some one to buy an already released source… unucky for you i research shit b4 i even think about buying anything… lol Gf
[/quote]Look at the link I PMed you again. You’re quite ignorant of the fact I quoted Runefreak10 in my source. I quoted him to show how great of a base I used to build upon. I purchased that source. Now it’s open to the public I see…

Look at all that I did, and try to picture it without actual pictures because it’s too much for me to upload. I never got around to it.

I was offering this source and assistance as a kind gesture to an Allstar developer. It’s been so long since I developed with this source or seen someone developing with an Allstar base.

Nonetheless, I’d still be glad to help you develop this server. Although, summer just ended for me, so I am way more busy. Good luck developing during school![/quote]Alright thanks man

Read full topic

item.description:

I like the idea of the 1 connection per IP. Could you PM me on how to do this? I want it on my server too! I think it will become very useful, and will help against spam bots.

item.title: [317] Insanity-Allstar [317]
item.dc:creator: @InsanityAllstar InsanityAllstar
item.description:
@InsanityAllstar wrote:

[quote=“Chassy13, post:15, topic:411826”]If you need any help send me/mr dope/matzie a PM. I/they can link you/give you some information for most of things, I’ve added all of them but XP lamps into my own server.

Glad to see people using Allstar (I personally don’t care if it’s stable, the servers are always fun to play).[/quote]Thanks so much im so glad to hear you love allstar… and thanks for those user names… i will pm you or them if i need help… wich i may or may not… im pretty good with allstars but once in a while i will get stuck… for example right now im trying to add a Npc that gives you a quest… no luck so far but if i get super stuck ill hit u up

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Insanity-Allstar [317]
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

If you need any help send me/mr dope/matzie a PM. I/they can link you/give you some information for most of things, I’ve added all of them but XP lamps into my own server.

Glad to see people using Allstar (I personally don’t care if it’s stable, the servers are always fun to play).
